education.subject: Python for Data Science & Machine Learning Bootcamp

cards.title: Data Engineering
cards.subtitle: BlueDot
cards.body: Working full-time for BlueDot to build their mobility data products which are based on our big data geospatial systems that analyze movement of people globally

cards.title: Data Analyst
cards.subtitle: Flatten.ca
cards.body: Consulting for Flatten.ca non-profit organization to help them perform quality control, analytics, and research with their COVID-19 symptoms survey designed for Canada and for Somalia

cards.title: GIS Data Analyst
cards.subtitle: Climate Risk Research Group (CRRG)
cards.body: Part-time consulting for the CRRG from the University of Waterloo to perform analysis related to climate change, sea-level rise, coastal erosion, global tourism, and COVID-19

cards.title: How Pandemics impact Tourism
cards.subtitle: Research paper maps and data viz
cards.body: A research paper for which I made maps visualizing the spread of COVID-19 via air travel.

cards.title: COVID-19 Global Health Status Dashboard
cards.subtitle: ArcGIS Online Dashboard
cards.body: An AGOL dashboard made to highlight the health status proportion of COVID-19 cases per country

cards.title: COVID-19 Regional Health Tracker
cards.subtitle: ArcGIS Online Dashboard
cards.body: An AGOL dashboard made to highlight the COVID-19 cases for the smallest subdivisions of USA & Canada

cards.title: Simple Flight Simulator
cards.subtitle: 3D GIS Project
cards.body: Made a simple flight simulator showing an airplane you can control that travels around the world!

cards.title: GISinEd2020 Conference
cards.subtitle: Esri Canada
cards.body: Attended the GIS in Education conference to learn how to natively use Jupyter Notebooks in ArcGIS Pro

cards.title: Data Analyst Job Interview Notes
cards.subtitle: Python Notebook
cards.body: Shared some of the data visualization code that I had written for a job interview with the Toronto Police Services

cards.title: Completed my Master in Geography
cards.subtitle: University of Waterloo
cards.body: My research was to understand how government organizations collaborate together for software development on GitHub

cards.title: How to create diverging stacked bar charts
cards.subtitle: Python Notebook
cards.body: Wrote a Python notebook demonstrating how to create diverging stacked bar charts for sentiment analysis using Plotly

cards.title: How to change plot data using Dropdowns
cards.subtitle: Python Notebook
cards.body: Wrote a Python notebook demonstrating how to change plot data using dropdowns in the Plotly data visualization library

cards.title: Growth of the ECCE App Challenge
cards.subtitle: Esri Canada Centre of Excellence
cards.body: I discuss my participation in the ECCE App Challenge and how much the competition size has grown over the years

cards.title: Bespoke - Chatbot NLP Workshop
cards.subtitle: Toronto Machine Learning Summit (TMLS)
cards.body: Volunteered for the TMLS and helped organize an NLP Chatbot creation workshop with guests from Bespoke

cards.title: App Pitch Presentation

cards.body: Attend the Esri International User Conference and present my app called SMART

cards.title: Win the ECCE App Challenge
cards.subtitle: Esri Canada Center of Excellence
cards.body: Built an Augmented Reality app called SMART to visualize real-estate in AR for community engagement

cards.title: How we made an AR App in 5 days

cards.body: Discussion of how my team and I made an Augmented Reality app using Esri's Runtime SDKs for AR/VR
